title: Battaglin Power+ EVO integrated steel road bike gets 40th Edizione Anniversario upgrade
content:
Officina Battaglin’s top-tier fully custom, Italian-crafted road bike is back and better than ever in this 40th anniversary limited edition Power+ EVO. As shiny as you could imagine in its unique cromovelato paint job, Battaglin has given the Power+ EVO an even sleeker integrated front end overhaul, thanks to a new lighter Italian-made fork and […]

The post Battaglin Power+ EVO integrated steel road bike gets 40th Edizione Anniversario upgrade appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
